name: Inscryption Multiplayer [Godot]
description:
A LAN Multiplayer fangame replicating the gameplay of Inscryption's act 2. Currently WIP.

Source code is available here: https://github.com/107zxz/inscr-onln

Known Issues:
- Card text is clipped
- Headless horseman's bone cost doesn't render
- Muscle mage has warren sigil for some reason

Stuff I haven't added yet
- Costs other than blood (other cards are free for now)
- Sigil effects. These will come after the known issues are fixed, as they'll complicate the game logic significantly
- Sorting by cost and cost type in deck editor
- Sorting and shuffling decks
- A way to delete decks in game
